scripts.frontend: cd frontend-apps && cd apps/customer-app && npx expo start
scripts.help:
echo '
=== WORKSPACE COMMANDS ===

Backend:
  npm run backend             - Start backend dev server
  npm run backend:prod        - Build & start in production mode
  npm run backend:docker      - Start backend with Docker (dev)
  npm run backend:docker:prod - Start backend with Docker (production)

Frontend:
  npm run frontend            - Start React Native app

Or navigate to each workspace:
  cd backend-apps && npm run start:dev
  cd frontend-apps && cd apps/customer-app && npx expo start
'
